From: Keler, Andreas <Andreas.Keler@mytilineos.com> 
Sent: Monday, April 1, 2024 5:57 PM
To: Kristina Lazarova <k.lazarova@tibiel.com>; Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Konstantopoulos <Akon@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: Operations LNG <lngops@mngtrading.com>
Subject: Draft Invoice MYT - TIBIEL 202403

 

Dear all,

 

Kindly find attached the draft invoice for March deliveries, for your review.

Once confirmed we can proceed with issuance of the relevant invoice,

 

Thank you in advance!

 

Best regards,

Andreas​​​​ Keler

Back Office Specialist

Gas Supply & Optimization

MYTILINEOS

8 Artemidos Str., Maroussi, 151 25 Athens, Greece

T: +30 210 6877343 <tel:+30%20210%206877343> 

mytilineos.com <http://www.mytilineos.com/> 

Please consider your environmental responsibility before printing this e-mail. 

The information contained in this communication is confidential, may be privileged and is intended for the exclusive use of the above named addressee.
